amendment.description: To modify the limited acquisition authority for the commander of the United States Joint Forces Command.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2544 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2544 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12784) To modify the limited acquisition authority for the commander of the United States Joint Forces Command.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2544 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2544 proposed by Senator Warner.
